title: ANÍBAL FERNÁNDEZ ASUME LA PRESIDENCIA DE LA CAH | Novedades | Confederación Argentina de Hockey
snippet: Aníbal Fernández resultó electo presidente de la Confederación Argentina de Hockey luego de la realización de la Asamblea Anual Ordinaria de la institución y ocupará el máximo cargo hasta el año 2025.

title: Aníbal Fernández fue reelecto y continuará al mando del hockey argentino - MDZ Online
snippet: El mendocino Sergio Daniel Marcellini será su vice. MDZ Deportes domingo, 27 de abril de 2025 · 12:15 hs · Anibal Fernández será el presidente de la Confederación Argentina de Hockey sobre Césped y Pista hasta el 2029.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: From 2021 to 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security under President Alberto Fernández. He has held many important government jobs under three different presidents. He worked in these roles for more than nine years in total.

title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Between 2021 and 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security in the cabinet of President Alberto Fernández. He has held several cabinet positions under three presidents, serving in these offices for a total of over nine years.

title: Aníbal Fernández - Manager profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: Without Club Last position: President Quilmes AC Date left: Jun 30, 2016
